briefTitle: Vitamin B12 for Aromatase Inhibitors Musculoskeletal Symptoms
officialTitle: A Single Arm Phase II Study of Oral Vitamin B12 for the Treatment of Aromatase Inhibitors (AI) Associated Musculoskeletal Symptoms in Women With Early Stage Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage Change in Average Joint Pain in Women With Aromatase Inhibitor-associated Musculoskeletal Symptoms (AIMSS) Compared to Baseline as Measured by the Brief Pain Inventory Short Form (BPI-SF).
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Sign informed consent and Pain level \> 4 in the BPI scale,
* Stage I-III

Exclusion Criteria:

* \<18 yrs
* Stage IV
* BPI Score \<4
* Zubrod score \>2
